title: Google\Cloud\AppEngine\V1\BasicScaling
name: BasicScaling
description:
A service with basic scaling will create an instance when the application receives a request. The instance will be turned down when the app becomes idle. Basic scaling is ideal for work that is intermittent or driven by user activity.

Generated from protobuf message google.appengine.v1.BasicScaling

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data.idle_timeout
params.description: Duration of time after the last request that an instance must wait before the instance is shut down.

params.name: data.max_instances
params.description: Maximum number of instances to create for this version.
